titles: The merry old vvoman: or, This is a good old woman, this is a merry old woman, her counsell is good ile warrant, for shee doth wish ill to no man. To the tune, This is my grannams deedle.
author: [Guy, Robert, writer of ballads.]
publisher: For F. Coules dwelling in the Old Baily.,
notes: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
